resources.string: Vibe and scribble with your friends
Discover fresh inspiration every day with our curated drawing prompts. From whimsical creatures to futuristic landscapes, there\'s always something exciting to create!
Share your artwork with fellow artists, discover amazing creations, and build connections through the universal language of art.
Our intuitive drawing tools make it easy to bring your ideas to life. Focus on creativity while we handle the technical details!

• Tap and hold to see brush preview
• Pinch to zoom in and out
• Two-finger tap to undo
• Three-finger tap to redo
• Long press tools for options

• Heart drawings you love
• Comment with encouragement
• Share your favorites
• Follow inspiring artists
• Join daily challenges

string-array.name: drawing_tips
string-array.item: Start with light sketches and build up details gradually
Don\'t worry about perfection - embrace happy accidents!
Use the grid feature to help with proportions
Try different brush sizes for varied line weights
Save your work frequently while drawing
Take breaks to see your art with fresh eyes
Study other artists\' techniques for inspiration
Practice basic shapes to improve your foundation
Use layers to separate different elements
